snippet: Mayor Cory A. Booker, who saved a woman from her burning house, said that “there was a time when I didn’t think we’d make it out of there.”
abstract: Newark, NJ, Mayor Cory A Booker holds press conference to answer questions about his experience rescuing a neighbor from her burning home.

byline.contributor: David W. Chen, Christopher Reeve and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mayor Cory A. Booker, who saved a woman from her burning house, said that “there was a time when I didn’t think we’d make it out of there.”

headline.seo: Mayor Cory Booker Says He Felt Terror in Fire Rescue
headline.main: After Rescuing Woman From Fire, a Mayor Recalls His Fear and Focus
headline.print_headline: After Saving Woman From Fire, A Mayor Recalls His Fear and Focus
